articles.author: Angela Fritz, CNN Senior Climate Editor
articles.title: Tips for staying safe in flooding: Keep an ax in the attic
articles.description: There is no more dangerous time for severe weather than after dark. You can't see the storm coming. You can't see the water rising. And, if it's late enough, you're not awake to hear the warnings.
